name: Mood Up team
tagline: Mobile, Web and IoT development experts
description:
Based in Poland, the Mood Up team takes an expert approach to bring your ideas to life. 
No project is off bounds with our technical expertise in Java / Kotlin (Android), Objective-C / Swift (iOS), React Native (mobile), Angular & React (frontend), node.js & django (backend). 
As a company, we are committed to delivering the highest quality. 
Work with a partner that can match your commitment.
